document.docAuthor: Woodman, Neal, Koch, Claudia & Hutterer, Rainer
document.masterDocTitle: Rediscovery of the type series of the Sacred Shrew, Sorex religiosus I. Geoffroy Saint-Hilaire, 1826, with additional notes on mummified shrews of ancient Egypt (Mammalia: Soricidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Rediscovery of the type series of the Sacred Shrew, Sorex religiosus I. Geoffroy Saint-Hilaire, 1826, with additional notes on mummified shrews of ancient Egypt (Mammalia: Soricidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: —Egypt: no locality (YPM 5963); Beni Suef, near Giza channel (ZFMK 1989.0102); Cairo, Abassia, NAMRU (FMNH 140086); Cairo, Mina House (BMNH 95.9.2.1–95.9.2.6); Dumyat, Damietta (FMNH 74556; USNM 311742); Gharbiya Tanta, Abu Gazia (FMNH 140088); Tanta (ZFMK 3 specimens); Giza (BMNH 4.5.15.1, 4.5.15.2, 9.7.1.14, 9.7.1.15—holotype; 9.7.1.81, 10.6.18.1); Giza: Abu Ghalib (FMNH 74937,74939, 74940, 91331; USNM 311749 – 311752); Giza: Abu Rawash (FMNH 74945, 75666, 79797,87600, 90459, 92259, 98972, 100740, 100743, 100777, 101374, 101375, 101886, 101997, 101998; USNM 311743, 311746, 311759, 311760, 341923, 341929, 341931; YPM 2803, 5828– 5830); Giza: Abu Rawash & El Mansuriya (FMNH 77323); Giza: Dahshur (FMNH 77322); Giza: El Baraqil (FMNH 80524; USNM 311744, 311745); Giza: El Mansuriya (FMNH 74558, 74568; 74569; USNM 341932, 311763, 311764); Giza: Kirdasa (FMNH 90458; USNM 341924, 341925); Giza: Manshiyet Radwan (USNM 311758); Giza: Nahya (FMNH 74570, 91218; USNM 311748); Giza: Saft el Laban (FMNH 89983); Giza: Sakkara (USNM 341930); Giza: Talbia (USNM 277293); Giza: Tanash (USNM 311747); Giza: Wardan (FMNH 74564, 74565; 74567, 74932, 74933, 74934; USNM 311753–311757). El Faiyum: Kom O Shim (FMNH 75667, 75668, 98166, 98167, 98168, 98221); El Faiyum:Kom Maushim (YPM 2802, 2937, 11500); El Faiyum: 3 Mi N Faiyum at Royal Shooting Club, Western Desert (USNM 311761, 311762).
